sentences.sContent: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.sCn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称，是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称。

sentences.sContent: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer - James Fenimore Cooper.
sentences.sContent_eng: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer - James Fenimore Cooper.
sentences.sCn: ‘麝鼠城堡’这个名字是一些爱开玩笑的官员给这座房子取的滑稽名字—— 詹姆士·菲里莫尔·库珀。

trans.tranOther: a waggish person makes clever and amusing jokes, remarks etc
